step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead. Remember to feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Keep your arm straight overhead and focus on opening your palm and fingers wide.
Great work opening your hand wide. Now, prepare to make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Nicely done! You made a fist while inhaling and tightening. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale and open your hand.
Second rep, looking good! Continue to keep your arm stretched overhead and feel the resistance.
Fantastic! Keep that palm and fingers wide open as instructed.
Well done on opening your hand. Get ready to inhale and make a fist, tightening your muscles.
Perfect! You made a fist while inhaling. Remember to relax and open your hand on the exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Focus on opening your hand wide and then making a fist while inhaling, relaxing as you exhale. This helps promote lymph flow.
